Subjects: Host; Eucharist; sermons, verse in; prayers, on sacraments; Sacrament, blessed; Blessed Sacrament
_description: Prayer of praise for corpus christi, in a Latin sermon — six lines

CULKk424.Transcription:
þys ys bred to preyseþat susteyneth þe wery &
                    makyth hym strong to wendþys ys bred meruelousþat god wold
                    to hys folke fro heuyn sendþat ys bred best of alþat
                    bryngyth hem þat hyt eten to ioye wyt owten eny ende
